title: Eternal Burning - Novel Updates
tags: Absent Parents   Adapted to Drama CD   Adapted to Manhua   Aggressive Characters   Arrogant Characters   Calm Protagonist   Disabilities   Family Conflict   Famous Parents   Handsome Male Lead   Loner Protagonist   Modern Day   Non-linear Storytelling   Persistent Love Interests   Possessive Characters   Sharp-tongued Characters   Student-Teacher Relationship   Tragic Past   Younger Love Interests
author: Hui Nan Que   回南雀
description:
The human body is a representation of the world, controlled by internal desires. Desire is driven by will. The will communicates desires through the body and governs our world. 

When your world becomes dazzling and shining like never before because of the arrival of a person, you should be alert. That is the collapse of will. 
*** 
Shang Muxiao x Bei Jie
Indifferent college student gong x cold and rational associate professor in a wheelchair shou
>
